name: International Research Conference on Women's and Gender Studies and for Women in Research
content: The conference starts on the 10th of October 2017: Ada Lovelace Day and offers a platform for: - Female researchers in any area, to present their studies, work, and research; - Worldwide researchers and scientists from academia, industry, and governments to present studies, exchange experiences, discuss proposals and disseminate results on women's and gender studies. - The creation of awareness on the proposed topics and lasting productive partnerships between the participants. All submitted papers will be published in the conference proceedings, and there will also be the possibility to publish papers on scientific journals. The organising committee would like to invite researchers from private and public institutions, research centres and universities, to submit abstracts on any topic related to women and/or gender and in fields and disciplines including, but not limited to: Entrepreneurship | STEM | Arts | Humanities | Social Sciences | Sports | Environment | Religion | Politics
